title: Exosomal lncRNA HCP5 derived from human bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells improves chronic periodontitis by miR-24-3p/HO1/P38/ELK1 pathway
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Yu Liu, Jin Zhu, Wei-hong Wang, Lian Zeng, Yan-ling Yang, Zhou Wang, Jian-qi Liu, Wei Li, Jing-yu Sun, Xiao-hong Yu
